planet.name: Kepler-53 b
KOI 829.01
KID 5358241
planet.description: This planet candidate was discovered by the Kepler spacecraft. It transits its host star every 18.65 days for 4.4815 hours. Periodic transit timing variations confirm its planetary nature.
